snippet: Mendrisio, Switzerland, its old downtown streets ringed by state-of-the-art factories, is home to three major gold refiners and a dark red merlot produced in nearby hills.
abstract: Mendrisio Journal; Mendrisio, Switzerland, is home to three of world's four major gold refineries and has become one of largest wine-growing regions in country; city's gold and wine production have fed prosperity that contrasts sharply with slump in surrounding regions, most notably northern Italy.
lead_paragraph: Mendrisio, Switzerland, its old downtown streets ringed by state-of-the-art factories, is home to three major gold refiners and a dark red merlot produced in nearby hills.

headline.seo: In Mendrisio, Switzerland, Gold Can Be Solid and Liquid
